name: Stratus Interactive
description:
Stratus Interactive is a full-service marketing firm that fully embraces the digital world, understanding its value and implications for organizations of all sizes. With a proven track record of over 20 years helping clients in industries such as education, healthcare, pharmaceuticals and consumer products, we expertly engage target audiences in new and innovative ways.
Our unique approach provides you with the best of both worlds by blending traditional disciplines in marketing and technology with our passion for innovation and creativity. We are not a marketing agency with a little bit of technology thrown in; nor are we a technology company with a little bit of marketing thrown in—we are a true blend of the two that integrates creativity, innovation and user experience with strong technical capabilities. Stratus Interactive’s approach focuses on engaging the organization’s audience through a holistic and integrated approach to marketing and communication. We are audience-¬centric—acknowledging the audience is where marketing begins, not where it ends.
